CustomField.formula: IF( Uplifted_Contract_Value1__c = 0, Contract_Value__c - Contract_Spend_To_Date__c, Uplifted_Contract_Value1__c - Contract_Spend_To_Date__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: An auto populated field that calculates the difference between the contract value and contract spend
CustomField.label: Difference Between Total Value and Spend
